name: Send Thaibulk SMS Message for new rows in Google Sheets
description:
Streamline your communication process by connecting Google Sheets directly to our Thaibulk SMS service. This predefined template monitors a specific worksheet for new rows and instantly sends a customized SMS message using the data from that row.

This is ideal for automating tasks such as sending event registration confirmations, notifying sales teams of new leads, or distributing status updates. By leveraging the data directly from your spreadsheet, ensure timely and accurate communication without manual effort.
